text: 2. What is the plaintext message that corresponds to the ciphertext 1213 0902 0539 1208 1234 1103 1374 that is produced using modular exponentiation with modulus p = 2591 and encryption key e = 13?7 Mention clearly what information is required to decode. That information is 797 and 0314 1314 1917 0400 0319 0708 1823. You are expected to know what 797 is and what the blocks of four digits are corresponding to the ciphertext. Write the decryption formula clearly. (3pts)
